forum.name: hangout
forum.description: a board to relax and discuss all kinds of miscellaneous topics. welcome!

thread.title: like a dead society

comments.text: i was bored,browsinh steam and found this game... its sobering to see how much love was,should i be the last soul to trudge these graves, know i tread lightly. rest well <3
lol shut up and join the anyland discord xd! code: a - h - ^a - s - 7 - ^u - 3
this game pioneered many things in vr, probably most i teresting was the system of interaction. most things in anyland are done by literally touching them, even the ui. even the ke
yboard. its all basically motion based with a few buttons. combined with playermade objects in a scriptable social world makes this ugly polygonal world somehow feel so emersive
that the immersion comes in spite of a complete lack of realism or even good graphics. the community, while it was alive, was incredible. a successor should surely focus on better
building and scripting, probably allowing lua or something in addition to visual scripting.
nope, i am the last person who visit anyland!

thread.latestCommentText: nope, i am the last person who visit anyland!
